# modifiedTaskList

**Instance Property**

The task list that you modified.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var modifiedTaskList: INTaskList? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTaskList] object containing the newly created tasks.

## Providing the Task Information

- **addedTasks**: The tasks that you added to the task list.
